name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Asian Food
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Sleight of Hand
description: Infiltrate a hardboiled, rain-slicked city of taboo, where ritual magic and cursed artefacts set apart those with power from those without. Sleight of Hand is a 3rd-person Stealth-Action Deckbuilder about taking down the coven you used to run with.

name: Creatures of Ava
description: Let your empathy guide you as you play an exciting action-adventure, creature-saver game. Understand and tame the creatures of Ava and let them lead you through a variety of ecosystems – all in the hopes of saving the planet from a life-consuming infection.

name: The Sinking City 2
description: The Sinking City 2 is a terrifying Lovecraftian journey, powered by Unreal Engine 5. Experience a heart-pounding survival horror as you explore the flooded city of Arkham and fight eldritch monsters beyond human comprehension.

name: Monster Jam Showdown
description: To deliver the feeling and excitement of mastering 1,500 horsepower mechanical machines, Monster Jam Showdown will feature arcade gameplay endowed with comprehensive and customisable driving aids.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Velvet Costume & BGM Set
description: Persona 3 Reload: Velvet Room Costume and BGM Set contains additional content that allows you to use exclusive Velvet Room themed costumes and listen to 5 BGM tracks.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden EX BGM Set
description:
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden EX BGM Set is exclusive to the Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass and contains additional content that allows you to listen to background music from Persona 4 Golden.

Tracks include the dungeon BGMs: "Backside of the TV", "Game", "Junes Theme", "Heaven" and "Long Way" along with the battle BGMs "Revelations: Mitsuo", "The Almighty" and "Results."

Results will automatically be applied as the battle result theme when you set one of the tracks in this pack as your battle BGM. It cannot be applied individually.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal EX BGM Set
description:
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal EX BGM Set is exclusive to the Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass and contains additional content that allows you to listen to background music from Persona 5 Royal.

Tracks include the dungeon BGMs "Life Will Change", "Beneath the Mask", "Kichijoji 199X", "Gentle Madman" and "I believe" along with the battle BGMs "Keeper of Lust", "Blooming Villain" and "Victory."

Victory will automatically be applied as the battle result theme when you set one of the tracks in this pack as your battle BGM. It cannot be applied individually.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Episode Aigis
description:
After unravelling the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fighting epic battles through Tartarus, and all the unforgettable events of Persona 3 Reload, the S.E.E.S. members find themselves trapped in a never-ending March 31st.

When an unfamiliar android, Metis, suddenly appears at the dorm along with the mysterious "Abyss of Time", the team works together to uncover the cause of this strange fate..

name: Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass
description: Dive deeper into the world of Persona 3 Reload with this expansion pass featuring new costumes, BGM, and extended story content Episode Aigis -The Answer-.

name: A-Ressha De Ikou 4: Map Construction & Power Up Kit
description: Adds the Map Construction mode as well as some new locations.

name: Abyss X Zero
description: Explore an expansive world in this 3D Metroidvania with enormous dungeons and stylish combat. Take control of two different characters, fated to battle each other: Codename A and Codename Z, both legendary heroes with unique abilities that change how you fight and interact with the environment.

name: Dark Days
description: A Supernatural Thriller from the indie creators of "White Night" and “Under The Waves” now remastered for PC gamers.

name: H Girl 3
description: Swap tiles to reveal 5 characters with NSFW jiggle physics images. Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level. Completed puzzles can be viewed later in the gallery. Swap, match and have love!

name: FunFitLand
description: Step into FunFitLand, where dance grooves and combat moves blend in a fresh and innovative fitness experience!

name: Search All: Tools
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the tools (mainly construction tools) in a large location. The tools will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to the most barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Lollipops
description: is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the lollipops in a large location. The lollipops will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Snakes

name: Search All: Dogs

name: Search All: Mouses
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mice in a large location. The mice will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks lively because of the animation elements

name: Bubballs
description: Click on bubballs to pop them. Get your pop-streak high to earn a medal. Clear stages to level up and get more bubballs. Alternatively, use the main bubball to pop the rest and clear stages to earn medals.

Full of toe-tapping mischief and off-beat melodies, Thumpies is a unique rhythm-based game where you keep the beat alive by tapping in time with Thumpies as they bounce and tumble to the musical score. The original inspiration for the hit mobile game My Singing Monsters, Thumpies is now remastered and re-imagined!

description: Beautifully drawn artworks from the DACHstudio members for you to puzzle. Multiple difficulties from 4x4 to 28x26 pieces for everyone to enjoy.

name: Hotdog Runner

name: Dr Muddles and the Cursed Library
description: Play as the talented but confused sorcerer, Dr Muddles, who wakes up in a strange library full of dangerous magic. Explore the library and try to unravel the mystery of how you got here, and more importantly, how to get out!

name: Giltsteader
description: Farming meets tower defense. Protect your homestead with randomized turrets while you complete quests, fish for resources, and grow crops while carefully selling them as prices shift each wave.

name: Jumping in the middle of the sky
description: "Jumping in the middle of the sky" is a challenging 3D platform game. Control a sphere through 30 obstacle-filled levels, with only five lives. Demonstrate your skills and reflexes to overcome each challenge.

name: Craft Lands
description: Let's develop the village! Craft Lands is a development simulation game where you plant trees in a vast empty space and develop a village. Defend your village from enemies and use resources to build houses and increase your population. What kind of village you create is entirely up to you.

name: Koob Dog
description: You are a dog. Bark, Jump, Sprint, and Zoom to collect all the Treasures and return them to their realms. Master the speed of your paws and the might of your leap to traverse All Five Worlds in this handcrafted adventure.

name: Potty Knight Saga
description: Player WANTED For hazardous journey, bitter condition, long months of complete darkness, constant danger, safe return doubtful, honor and recognition in case of success. The controls are simple. But this game is the pinnacle of the challenge" "Does this game look cute?"

name: Shogun Curse
description: Face demons and monsters while seeking revenge for the curse casted upon you. Will you find those responsible and finally lift it?

name: OG Memory: Synthwave Boats
description: OG Memory: Synthwave Boats is an casual memory game with stunning images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: City Super Battlefield
description: Control characters to use weapons to engage in battles in the city, challenging more challenging battles

name: Milky Way: TD Survivors Autobattler RTS
description: Milky Way is a unique mix of Tower Defense, RTS, Auto-Battler and Survivors. Build your base, choose random upgrades and use powerful skills to survive against hordes of enemies.

name: John's Hell
description: Simple first person horror. Presents the fate of John Cramter, who searches for the cause of his brother's death in a warehouse purchased before his death.

name: Reversi Temple
description: Reversi Temple is a wonderful strategy board game suitable for all ages. Listen to the in-game LoFi music whilst and let it run whilst you study making moves when you need a break. Be able to create your own custom board, such as creating a 3,600 tiled board and play for hours.

name: Poorzzle: Puzzle Alive
description: Welcome to Poorzzle - Puzzle Alive, a pure speculative puzzle game. Here, simple lines outline the ultimate purity, and 12 crafted puzzles will subvert your way of thinking. Puzzle comes alive when you unlock it.

name: Lock n Drop Bracket Racing
description: Racers can Select from multiple cars and race split screen with a friend!

name: Easter 2024 Memory
description: Easter 2024 Memory is an casual memory game with stunning images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Easter 2024 Puzzle
description: Easter 2024 Puzzle is an puzzel game with beautiful easter eggs in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Fantastical Mystery ADV: Ultimate Jumbo Jet Murder Case
description: A novel game featuring the popular streamer group "Ultimate Jumbo Jet"! Search for clues and discover the truth through "Fantastical Mystery"!

name: Strange
description: The main character, who moves to another city, finds himself in unexpected mysterious events when her new friend disappears.

name: Snow White Ashes
description: Lose your heart in this dark fairy-tale romance! Once upon a winter night, you enter the woods in search of a beast. But the hunter you find is so charming and sweet–is he truly the monster you seek?

name: Code Racer
description: Code your vehicle with a series of commands to complete various courses, tasks, stunts, and races in this physics-based brain teasing racing puzzle game!

name: Darkness Ritual: Impasse
description: You witnessed a dark ritual taking place and nothing will go wrong from now on. You are stuck in an unknown place, can getting out of here and solving the secrets save you from this impasse?

name: The Big Below
description: Take on the role of a little gnome exploring twisting, secret-filled dungeons in this retro, top-down adventure game.

name: No Strings Attached
description: No Strings Attached is a puzzle platform thriller where you play as Pavo, a newly-sentient puppet, in a struggling circus. Marionette Pavo's arms to swing, climb, and more to escape your Master's true intentions.

name: Arena Survivors
description: Arena Survivors - A bullet hell game about visiting interesting places and destroying everything in sight.

name: Fantastyc Murder Mystery
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling Murder Mystery where you play as the perpetrator or detective. Other players worldwide will scrutinize your every move as they attempt to solve your murders. Meanwhile, sift through evidence, and uncover the true culprit in unique player-generated crime scenes.

name: Cyber Storm
description: In Cyber Storm You must defend or attack an electronic system Computer, game console, server; All this in a Sci-fi environment. 4V4 team eight unique characters with unique abilities !!

name: Breaking Bound
description: You will start on a simple and relaxing 2D platforming adventure, treasure hunt and monster upgrades, traditional character development, unique skill upgrades, and grow from a novice to a master. Give it a try.

name: Sector Yama
description: Sci-fi survivors game with a story campaign. Play as a space soldier, abandoned by the command on an alien planet. Find allies, gather resources, train new troops, and escape from Sector Yama. Casual "single-stick shooter" controls, fun tactical combat, rewarding exploration, and rich storytelling.

name: Fox Trot
description: Embark on a wild journey in Fox Trot! Play as a nimble fox, collecting coins amidst a dynamic forest. Evade obstacles, unlock skins, and seize daily rewards for endless, thrilling fun. Download now and let the running begin!

name: ReThink 3.5
description: ReThink 3.5 is a previously unreleased Puzzle Game rebuilt in Unreal engine 5, in a peaceful futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.

name: Codename Attila
description: Codename Attila is a First TPS Shooter Survivors-like game. Defend yourself against hordes of enemies coming at you. Use all your skills and strategy to survive. Enhance your character to strengthen your power and enjoy the taste of this power against your enemies.

name: DNA: Episode 3
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: Mercs Inc
description: 'Mercs Inc': A dynamic blend of tower defense, RTS, and RPG in a fast-paced, top-down strategy game. Engage in thrilling, small-scale combat for an action-packed adventure!

name: Dr. What & Detective Son
description: Join Dr. What and Detective Son on an exhilarating journey through mind-bending puzzles and perplexing mysteries in this immersive logic game! With multiple levels to conquer, sharpen your deductive skills and unravel intricate cases.

name: The Showdown Effect: Reloaded
description: Experience fast-paced over-the-top multiplayer action in The Showdown Effect: Reloaded. Join players from around the world to engage in high-octane battles filled with bullets, explosions, and one-liners!

name: TESD: Into the Vortex
description: After performing a mock-ritual during the 2017 Halloween podcast, Baron Von Flanagan unknowingly unleashed a power long since sealed and thrust all of TESD Town into another dimension. Take control of Bry, Walt, and Q as they venture into the vortex in an attempt to save all of TESD Town!

name: Spellbound FPS
description: First person shooter game based on the first part of the Spellbound series of books. You play as Damitri with his ability to use ice magic. The player will use snowballs and icicles to defeat enemies. They will use Laura's song or scream to heal yourself or hurt foes. 14 stages 4 bosses and 3 modes.

name: Color Hunt: Number Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Number Grid Coloring Puzzle Game! Color Hunt is a fun and relaxing puzzle game. It's more than just coloring- it's a randomly generated number block jigsaw game that'll take your brain to another level!

name: Andarin Weppes: Pre-Dementia
description: Andarin Weppes is a first person puzzle experience of a man with ever advancing dementia...

name: The Czar is Dead
description: THE CZAR IS DEAD is a visual novel in the setting of the Russian Empire. Help the last russian emperor save his soul, life and country.

name: Cursed House 13
description: A new Cursed House game. A new set of tricky levels. A new town to unspell. Play it relaxed, Time/Moves limited modes and replay your favourite levels.

name: Bespoken
description: Bespoken is a Co-op Roguelike, survival, wave defense game where you delve into monster filled dungeons, escape with treasures, get resources, build your own fort and protect it against the monster hordes at night.

name: Echoes of the Sun
description: This moving puzzle adventure story is about a little girl who witnessed the tragic fall of her homeland and the Sun explosion. The last one standing, she has a burden to restore light to the land and peace in her heart. Will she handle it?

name: Coin-Op Vice
description: Survive in the final battle to save the lost world of 80s arcade halls. Build the best game cartridge deck to purge the mysterious buildings from the hold of hostile entities. Complete levels of legendary arcades to expand your deck.

name: Jumping Steve
description: Jumping Steve is a 2d arcade style indy casual roguelike game. Stay on the crows. Collect the thingies to increase your score so you can unlock stuff. With over 2 Achievements, about 56 probably. Power ups. lot of settings to change Works on computers Not compatible with the gameboy camera.

name: Fire Path
description: Embark on a pixelated journey through "Fire Path," where mischievous goblins and haunting ghosts light your way. Master challenging gameplay, adapt to diverse enemies, and explore atmospheric landscapes. Can you conquer the flames? Your 2D adventure awaits!

name: Hannah’s day
description: Hannah's Day is an action-puzzle adventure about Hannah, who aspires to put together her own rock band. Ignore your parents' opinions, grab your skateboard and go chase your dreams!

name: Bakkal Simulator
description: Market Owner provides simulation of traditional small market, grocery businesses in Turkey. In addition to simulation elements, it features story structures in the Role Playing and Choices Matter genres.

name: Desposis
description: Father Mandus, armed only with his sacred crucifix and the hallowed verses of his Bible, embarks on a daring crusade to vanquish the malevolent presence that lurks within the cursed confines of the Williams mansion.

name: Noiseless
description: Noiseless is a first-person survival horror game. You follow the story of a freelance investigative journalist who tries to uncover the secrets of the Gaudium Hospital.

name: From The Night
description: Make your way through this retro world, by dodging traps to get from the start door to the end door.

name: Kaidro: Clan Battles
description: Kaidro: Clan Battles is near-isometric multiplayer ARPG, that expands on top of the hit comic series Kaidro: The Awakening. Choose a clan, engage in competitive multiplayer battles, and beware of rivals and sinister forces from the Void. Alpha release imminent!

name: That One Dungeon
description: That One Dungeon is a fast-paced dungeon crawler filled with never-ending levels, monsters, and traps! Choose your class and shoot them down to obtain your best score yet! Navigate through a labyrinth-style dungeon while trying to find hidden secrets and evade your inner fears!

name: Drench
description: Inspired by my favourite games from the 90s and 2000s: DRENCH is an indie multiplayer/single-player sandbox experience where players can explore, colonize, or battle across an open galaxy!

name: Iconia Defenders
description: Build mazes, customize your deck and travel through time, in a nostalgic tower defense game with a minimalist feel and a rogue-lite twist. Only you can save the Tree of Life from the malevolent forces of The Corruption...

name: DOS: Steve Pardo
description: DOS - the album, the game, by Steve Pardo. Minimalistic isometric music-driven platformer game.

name: Lumina Rush
description: Lumina Rush is a single-player speed running platformer. Master speed by utilizing sliding, propulsion, swinging, and teleportation to dominating levels at the speed of light.

name: They Speak To Us
description: They Speak To Us is a 1-4 person co-op horror game. Voice record your own monsters, and capture them before the time runs out. Utilize a gravity gun flash light to both help or hinder your friends and monsters alike.

name: Grow a Carrot
description: Ever dreamed about growing a carrots? For a cheap price I present you an indie game where you can plant and harvest carrots, get them from a tree, fight with the carrots slimes and dig them out of the Mine.

name: Winnie-The-Pooh Taste Test
description: Platform through a Winnie-The-Pooh picture book. Use your reaction skills and abilities to fight creatures, explore new areas, and collect honey!

name: Sol Apocalypse
description: KNOW YOUR ENEMY. FIRE YOUR CANNONS. A spaceship management and combat game. As the Captain of Silver Wolf, command your crew and use your energy strategically. Change your future with your decisions. Arm your ship and strengthen its shields. Survive in the solar system full of dangers.

name: HopStepHotspring
description: HopStepHotspirng is a simple jumping action game Using a simple but deep 3-step jump Let's overcome various terrains to reach the legendary secret hot spring together with the main character, Atsumi.

name: Banana Step
description: You are a walking Legendary Banana. Let's tripping monkey and lifting them.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Ice Lair
description: Carved into an arctic glacier lies a brutalist subterranean hideout cloaking an ice-cold plot against humanity. Use your putting skills to stop an evil scientist and her puffin henchmen intent on perfecting their freeze ray technology... Get ready for a heated challenge in this sinister arctic base!

name: Risk: Global Domination - Dune Map Pack
description: Engage in strategic warfare across spice-rich deserts, Fremen sietches, and sprawling cities with these five limited release maps inspired by Dune: Part Two.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash - Jujutsu High First-Years Outfit Set
description: This outfit set includes costumes with 4 color variations for Yuji Itadori, Megumi Fushiguro, and Kugisaki Nobara that can be used during battles.

name: AirportSim: Bologna Airport
description: Dive into the heart of Italy with AirportSim's Bologna Airport DLC. Operate at the bustling Guglielmo Marconi Airport, a vital link connecting the picturesque Emilia-Romagna region to the world. Use a special Follow-Me sports car that operates in Bologna!

name: Dune: Spice Wars - House Vernius of Ix
description: In the heart of the Ixian Confederation, House Vernius, masters of science and engineering, established itself as the Empire's primary supplier of cutting-edge technology. Adapting to the constraints of the Butlerian Jihad, they discreetly explore forbidden self-learning tech.

name: Reign of Guilds: Banneret

name: Reign of Guilds: Raubritter
description: Continue your journey with this pack unlocking additional exclusive in-game content!

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Steel Giants

name: Meow Moments: Valentine's Day

description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion The Dark Urge (if you don't already have them) Mind Flayer Dark Urge Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for The Dark Urge 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold The Dark Urge Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Donaar (if you don't already own them) Aasimar Glitch Donaar Skin An Epic Feat for Donaar 7 Gold Donaar Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Undead Knight Solaak Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Solaak (if you don't already own them) Undead Knight Solaak Skin An Epic Feat for Solaak 7 Gold Solaak Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Baldur's Gate Dynaheir Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Dynaheir (if you don't already have them) Baldur's Gate Dynaheir Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Dynaheir 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Dynaheir Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: California Swingers Club: Season 1 - Sea Swap
description: Two couples rent a spacious sailboat for the perfect vacation, but as they venture out onto the water, their journey takes an unexpected turn.

name: Victoria 3: Trains Bonus Pack
description: The power and potential of steam transportation is brought to new life for Victoria 3 in Trains Bonus Pack. This new free pack for Paradox Interactive's grand strategy society simulation is free for all players.

name: Hues
description: Move sprites slices and destroy color blocks.

name: Hues: Moon Sea
description: 40 more levels with water and buoyancy!

name: Big Klondike: FreeCell Solitaire
description: Support Big Klondike and unlock FreeCell Solitaire.

name: Classified: France '44 - Guerrilla
description:
Expand your arsenal and take the fight to the enemy with new Spec Ops missions and a brand new map in the Guerrilla Pack.

The Guerrilla Pack contains:
New Map – “Church”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Tomb Raiders
• Time to Kill
Two new weapon variants
• Bren “Ambush”
• Thompson “Boa”
New Clothing Set
• Female Resistance “Guerrilla”

name: Classified: France '44 - Resistance Kit
description:
Get a heads start against the enemy with the Resistance Kit.
The Resistance Kit contains:

“Shadow” pattern weapons pack:
M1 Carbine “Shadow”
Lee Enfield “Shadow”
Trench Gun “Shadow”

“Ghost” pattern resistance clothing:
Resistance Hat “Ghost”
Resistance Jacket “Ghost”
Resistance Trousers “Ghost”

name: Classified: France '44 - Season Pass
description: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: Maze of Realities: Symphony of Invention DLC
description: Who says you can't have another otherworldly, literally, adventure? You and your friend have been invited to visit the world of Innovatix! Go on an adventure soon!

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - The Great Don 71
description: Take a ride aboard your trusty Don 71 with an exclusive dinosaur-themed paint job.

name: Wyvern Studios Solitaire: 30th Aniversary Edition
description: Wyvern Studios Solitaire: 30th Anniversary Edition features Klondike Solitaire and Pyramid Solitaire, 9 different deck styles, and supports mouse, keyboard, and gamepads. The base game is offered for free and can be played as is without any cost forever.

name: DACHstudio Jigsaw Puzzle Box: Vanlau's Tinybuns
description: 20 beautifully hand drawn tinybun paintings from vanlau to puzzle.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Retro Revival
description: 3 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Retro style tables with gameplay inspired by EMs of the past.

name: Go! Save The Queen!
description: The ants have lost their queen; help them find a new one! Armed with toys, explosives, and other items, think fast, draw lines to command your ants, and protect your queen from the hordes of enemy insects looking to put an early end to their rule in this funny but brutal escort tower defense game.

name: The Land of the Magnates
description: An epic adventure of love, betrayal, and sacrifice awaits, rooted in Middle Eastern myths and legends! As Shahbaz, a disgraced prince, travel across magical realms, defeat minions of darkness with the magic of your sitar, and reclaim your throne, bringing the light back to the Land of the Sun.

name: Pro Football
description: Relive the thrill of football management with "PC Football Classic"! Inspired by the classic football managers from 90's, this title invites you to dive into the exciting world of football. A masterpiece of strategy and sports management that challenges your ability to lead your team to glory.

name: Tails of Glimmervale
description: Welcome to Glimmervale! Meet cute yet fierce animal characters, fight greedy bandits, and discover the secrets of a dark past in this cozy souls-like adventure.

name: Darkness Machine
description: Darkness Machine Game is a sword fight and shooting. Shoot by auto gun and Missile. Players will control a character that can use sword , auto Gun or missile to destroy enemy. Player can change to power body. Makes the attack harder. Can fly and shoot rockets. Age 18+ Only

name: Pimp My Dice
description: Pimp My Dice is a Yahtzee Roguelike experience. Score enough to make it to the next level, customize your dice to score more and collect relics to create unlimited combos! Collect money through the rounds to buy new dice, relics, and customizers to upgrade your dice. Enjoy a new run every time!

name: Hanno
description: Join Hanno, an unusual elephant, and Vimal, his newly young companion, as they face challenges brought by…fate? Fight, stealth, explore, sort things out and get ready to uncover the cost of loyalty in this stunning, mysterious, heartfelt action-adventure game.

name: Flagdashers
description: Dash your way to capture the flag and bring it to your team's chest base. Choose your hero, each overflowing with cuteness and boasting unique abilities, to secure your flag. The first team to score in a best-of-five series wins.

name: Endless Ocean
description: This is a flying shooting game with a super cool red fighter appearance

name: Meet My Teacher
description: Today is the day, grab your backpack and meet your four new teachers. Which one will be your favorite and special one?

name: Sword Fight
description: "Sword Fight" is a card battle game based on the martial arts world. Players can play as a mysterious knight in the arena and team up with other players for 3v3 confrontation.

name: Yomi 2: Renegades
description: Includes two new characters (Troq and River), two new gems (Orange and Diamond), and the ability to play any of the unlockable "wacky rulesets" from Career Mode in online friend matches.

name: Zerko
description: A puzzle game filled with shapes, numbers, and a straightforward goal: make every number zero.

name: Yaad
description: Immersion game, evolve like a child practicing a game loop without fear of error and judgment.Interaction and immersion tool for learning the English language. Training and task simulations, rich stimuli, and gradual changes close to real-life experiences.

name: XP Racing
description: XP Racing is a love letter to the classic racing games from the NES era!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Society Islands XP: Tahiti & Windward Islands
description: Welcome to Tahiti and the Windward Islands, the eastern part of the Society Islands in the South Pacific. Arrive with an airliner (up to Boeing 747 and Airbus A380) at Faa'a International Airport and go island hopping with a smaller aircraft, or test your skills as a medical air pilot.

name: Pacman Club
description: Club Pacman is a Ms.Pac-Man-like game with the same object as Pac-Man except, Club Pacman has some new features including: Music when you eat a Power Pellet, Turbo speed when eating a Power Pellet, Fast fruit, faster ghosts when you get good, and speed options.

name: XRick
description:
Way before Lara Croft, back in the 1980’s and early 1990’s, Rick Dangerous was the Indiana Jones of computer games, running away from rolling rocks, avoiding traps, from South America to a futuristic missile base via Egypt and the Schwarzendumpf castle. xRick is a clone of Rick Dangerous, known to run on Linux, Windows, BeOs, Amiga, QNX and plenty of other platforms!

This port for the 32X is developed by Chilly Willy.

name: Silver Level Pack
description: A pack of custom levels. This hack features seven levels with custom music, custom sprites and custom palettes.

name: The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle Atarisized
description: This is a hack of Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle where the graphics have been changed to resemble graphics found on the Atari 2600. Also included is a patch with 64 all new levels. The graphics and levels were created in separate patch files so that they may be compatible with other hacks. For example, the graphics patch may be applied to other level hacks where the graphics were left unchanged.

name: Puck-Man Puzzler
description:
This is Debiru's second NES game made with Retro Puzzle Maker. Here is the description on what he says about his homebrew:

"Puck-Man Puzzler I couldn't exactly copy Pac-Man, or steal any graphic's from his existing games, so I had to make my own original Graphics, which are not that great as my Puck-Man isn't animated an is based on a Square but it works for now this is just the first Demo, of what may or may not become a full game. It only has 8 levels..

Unlike Pac-Man there are no Ghost, Enemies, or Power Pellets in this game instead you just collect the coins then go to the exit to proceed to the next level. This is just the concept I am trying out for now in future versions it may be a bit different."

name: Alien Nah'Topsy
description:
Destroy the Evidence!

Evade the authorities by helping our little dude push the alien DNA evidence into the garbage and escape into his UFO.

name: Miku Runner
description: An extensive and detailed ROM hack of the NES version Lode Runner featuring legendary virtual idol Miku Hatsune, and contains new graphics, levels, and music.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Society Islands XP: Tahiti & Windward Islands
description: Welcome to Tahiti and the Windward Islands, the eastern part of the Society Islands in the South Pacific. Arrive with an airliner (up to Boeing 747 and Airbus A380) at Faa'a International Airport and go island hopping with a smaller aircraft, or test your skills as a medical air pilot.

name: Worst Coach in the World
description: Ready to leave skating forever, Valentina starts her first job at a resort, only to be reassigned as its rink manager.

name: World of Warplanes: Potez 540 Pack
description: Potez 540 is a real giant in the sky: huge and durable, blistering with defensive turrets and carrying a hefty package of 500 pound bombs, it is dangerous to targets both in the sky and on the ground.

name: Find Cats
description: “A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”

name: Where Safety Ends R
description: What does it take to be SAFE? Maybe it's all about a person who will come to your rescue no matter what. Or maybe it has to do with a place that you know inside and out. OR, perhaps, (just maybe) a room full of strangers with no entrance might just do the trick.

name: WhyImmortal
description: What is Immortal is a multiplayer sandbox game with Chinese Immortal Cultivation culture. Players take on the role of a cultivator, exploring, cultivating, refining and other events, during which they will realize the true meaning of "seeking immortality", "the great way" and "longevity".

name: Wizard Mukbang: The Game
description: Experience Wizard Mukbang like never before! You are the Mukbang Wizard, a famous food wizard. Battle cursed food and grab loot in this classic turn-based RPG as you level up and grow stronger. Gather party members and determine the fate of the Kingdom. Strange mysteries need to be solved...

name: Wave Weaver
description: Wave Weaver is a high action water combat VR game. Face off against your opponent by creating and manipulating water to become a hurricane on the battlefield. Utilizing the abilities at your disposal, create a fluid arsenal to wreak havoc towards any person who stands in your way!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - T'au
description: The young and technologically-advanced race is the latest playable faction in Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector. Fourteen new units are available to extend the Greater Good to all the species of the galaxy.

name: WarSphere: The Worthy Branch
description: Unlocks 3 additional acts, 2 additional endings and 35 new enemy types for the WarSphere base game.

name: Weapon Mix
description: Buy weapons, flee from enemies and survive as long as possible. Improve your weapons to last longer

name: Way of the Hunter: Map Pack 2
description: The Way of the Hunter Map Pack 2 includes the Outfits Pack and two new region DLC's, each new map is 64 square kilometers / 25 square miles and comes with new animals, story and features.

name: Way of the Hunter: Matariki Park
description: Discover the stunning beauty of New Zealand, from cascading waterfalls to tranquil beaches, as well as its unique and diverse wildlife, including sambar deer and Himalayan tahr!

name: Unou Paradise
description:
A game that cracks in the tired right brain appears!
"Unou Paradise" is a game that fun to play and check the ability of the "right brain" that controls human intuition, inspiration, creativity, and image. Check the ability of the "right brain" while doing various tasks (games) such as quickly counting the animals in the herd and instantly picking up the same picture as the sam. There are 8 types of assignments (games) included. It is equipped with an "exam" mode that is conducted through all assignments and a "practice" mode that allows you to play only one type of assignment.

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Dark Fantasy Cosmetic Pack
description: Dark Fantasy Cosmetic Pack

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Holidays Cosmetic Pack
description: Holidays Cosmetic Pack

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Military Cosmetic Pack
description: Military Cosmetic Pack

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Phantasm Cosmetic Pack
description: Phantasm Cosmetic Pack

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Uniforms Cosmetic Pack
description: Uniforms Cosmetic Pack

name: Vollema
description: Vollema is a hand-drawn 2.5D adventure where you, a college volleyball player, tackle your problems the best way you know how... through volleyball!

name: Virtual Rides 3: Ride Pack
description: Get ready to elevate your virtual funfair experience with two exciting new rides: "Glider" and "Upside Down".

name: Virtual Jigsaw Puzzles: Animals
description: Jigsaw Puzzle game, with beautiful pictures of animals

name: Virtual Darling: VR
description: Experience love without limits in Virtual Darling - VR! Select your ideal companion, evolve together through fantastical worlds, share intimate moments, and embark on romantic adventures. This is more than a game; it's a revolutionary journey into the future of relationships.

name: VirtualBuster
description: "Virtual Buster is an action-adventure game where you take out robot criminals with swords and guns in a realistic virtual reality (VR) world. Players use special weapons and missions of varying difficulty to emerge as city heroes and demonstrate strategy."

name: Victim Complex
description: In this narrative-driven, first-person horror game, hack medium Jack Lognare discovers his first legitimate haunting. Initially thrilled to use his phony "ghost equipment" for real, he soon learns that the Entity that killed the inhabitants of the apartment complex has chosen him as its next target.

name: Versus Dev
description: Explore, evolve and take on the developer.

name: Vacant's Mine
description: So you’ve been arrested? No Problem! In Vacant’s Mine you can regain your freedom in just 7 Days! With a Mine Railway and a Plunger you’ll navigate through an abandoned mine to steal eggs. But beware of the Greebs, they have terrifying big mouths and razor sharp teeth!

name: Unyverse
description: Unyverse is a sci-fi, action role-playing game (ARPG) created by Afrime Studios. Unyverse delivers an immersive, story-driven gameplay experience for single and co-op players enriched by a deep Afro-Futuristic aesthetic.

name: Jam Scrapz Collection: Valentide! II
description: Your mission is simple: kill as many humans as possible before the time runs out.

name: For Honor: Varangian Guard - Hero
description: Brandishing axes and shields, Varangian Guards disable enemies with their signature defensive stance, Oathkeeper.

name: Trajectory of summer flower Ⅱ
description: "Wherever I am, as long as you're there, that place is my home." This is a romantic adventure game that revolves around the themes of family and rural customs. Set in the Eden touched by the summer breeze, the village journey of lavender and the colorful summer begins once again!

name: Trap Yuri Garden
description: Traps in motion at long last! Trap series creators Aogiri Penta and Nishida Hajime bring us another exciting title, a cross-dressing yuri love story that will shatter its readers sense of values into a thousand pieces!

name: Unstrayed
description: Detect anomalies and survive in a space module! Can you break the experiment loop and reveal all the secrets?

name: Un/Fragment
description: A short 10 minute visual novel about being a fragment in the universe and trying to find a way out of the ****.

name: Under Walls
description: Explore randomly generated levels, collect treasures, and evade monsters. Play solo or with up to 6 players online. Customize your space between matches.

name: Uncle's Basement
description: Are you trapped in a small dark room and want to get out? You don't have much time, so hurry up! Oh, and good luck!

name: UltiMahjong
description: Riichi Mahjong Roguelike. Race an ever-accelerating score counter. Take full advantage of upgrades and usable items to force hands you've only dreamed of over the table. Build the perfect closed hand or make calls with abandon. Take risks, or get lost in the dust.

name: Twilight Manor
description: Twilight Manor: Roguelite FPS is a bloody and brutal shooter game that features beautiful cutscenes, jaw-dropping map design and an upgrade system you can carry over into Newgame+! Uncover the secret behind the mansion as you battle through bosses and enemies with a wide arsenal of weapons

name: TP Bullet
description: Pistol-shooting portal puzzle platforming! Use your enchanted bullet to clear each level and save the city!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KSTL Airport
description: (IATA: STL, ICAO: KSTL) St. Louis Lambert International Airport is the largest and busiest commercial airport serving St. Louis, Missouri, US. The airport provides nonstop service to airports throughout the US, Canada, Europe. In 2023 there were more than 270 daily departures.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: MMPR Airport
description: Puerto Vallarta International Airport, officially named - Licenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport (IATA: PVR | ICAO: MMPR) - is the main and only airport located in Puerto Vallarta municipality of Jalisco, on the Pacific coast of Mexico.

name: Tower Of Wishes 3: Japan
description: Tower of Wishes 3: Japan is a match 3 game that tells the story of Ryu, a skilled ninja who is on the run, being pursued by his own clan. Unable to shake off the relentless pursuit, Ryu decides to seek his destiny in climbing the Tower Of Wishes.

name: Tower Doomer
description: satisfy your demolishing urges with Tower Doomer ! Complete levels in various environments with limited strokes or create your own demolishing derby in the sandbox mode. Tear down multiple structures by shooting at them or use gravity at your own advantage !

name: Touhou Kourinden: Mythos of Phantasmagoria
description: The epic beginning of the Federal Kingdom of Kozan.

name: Touhou Eternal Spell Cards
description: In Eastern Eternal Spell Cards,The balance between humans and yokai is at stake as the evil yokai, Black Shadow, awakens to conquer the Eastern world. Through intense bullet-hell battles, she faces challenging stages and enemies to become the savior. DISCORD：https://discord.gg/pQe2bgqEzC

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Toby Fox & ZUN "U.N. Owen Was Hero?"
description: This DLC grants access to the playable song "U.N. Was Hero?" by Toby Fox & ZUN. Download this DLC to be able to challenge Flandre Scarlet and... wait, who is that...?

name: Toofan AlAqsa
description: A shooter game is about protecting AlAqsa and Palestine . for the support of Palestine .. #FreePalestine

name: Total Rush
description: We've fused Card Gaming with the Battle of Total War to create the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Combine a unique deck from different factions, rally your legions, and charge to defeat all your opponents!

name: Tokyo School Girl
description: Use Souls-Like combat with a sword, gun, or your hands in this epic Third-Person adventure in the open world city of Tokyo to defeat the powerful ruler named Lion Knight and save your sister who is destined to save the city from destruction.

name: To Be In Love With Girls Group
description: "To Be Love With Girls Group" is the world's first real-life interactive video game for nurturing girl groups, produced by "Guanghe Media". Game players will take on the role of a girl group agent from the first perspective in the game to search for and discover girl group trainees

name: Tobby The Dog
description: Small and a bit clumsy but smart and friendly, Tobby wants to explore the city and ends up having adventures with friends.

name: Tiny Lands: Expansion Pack 3
description: Take your perceptivity to a new dimension in a relaxing low-poly isometric puzzle game. Find the differences in the beautiful, fully rotatable, and zoomable 3D environments. Can you find them all?

name: Titan Forge
description: Titanforge: In a distant and mysterious realm, colossal mechs emerge as both saviors and enigmas. These towering machines, their origins shrouded in myth, become the vessels for our survival. Forge alliances, craft your path, and seek the truth. The colossal mech awaits your command.

name: T.K. Punk: G.O.L.D
description: Cyber Three Kingdoms Turn-Based Strategy RPG— As the latest humanoid AI developed, you were kidnapped by Zhang Jiao and joined the resistance organization—GOLD. Develop yourself, accept commissions, research prosthetics, cultivate companions and pursue the love and destruction in your heart!

name: Tink: The Last Fairy
description: Side-scrolling Action-Adventure Players take on the role of Wendy, venturing into the mystical world of Neverland. The objective is to thwart Captain Hook's sinister plans and reclaim the Fairy Spring. Embark on this new adventure as Wendy to save your loved one and alter the fate of Neverland.

name: Thumbling
description: Thumbling is a game about exploring and solving labyrinthine puzzles in an immersive environment. The player is a castaway who must use his sense of reflection, his deduction and his skill to mark a path using colored gems, in order to escape from a mysterious island.

name: Things Too Ugly
description: Clock in at TEREBRO INC. for the night shift in 1986. Protect the company's legacy as Risk Assessment Data Processor. Equipped with era-specific technology, navigate through obscured narratives to shape the company's future.

name: The Witch of Fern Island: Wonderful Witch Pack
description: Obtain this fantastic Radiance Witch outfit to show off around the town! A beautiful chest will appear near the mailbox and contain a set of bourgeois furniture and wallpapers. This set of deluxe items will turn your cozy life into a new classy experience!

name: The War in Chiapas
description: Control a group of young people who enter the jungle of Chiapas, Mexico, in the eighties, to form a guerrilla whose objective is to create an army to overthrow the government through a new revolution, however, a paramilitary group appears unexpectedly.

name: The Warden's Paradise
description: Warden's Paradise is a live action interactive video game where players play the role of a prison warden caught in a conspiracy, interacting with five women with different styles and purposes. Through your choices, gradually uncover the truth of the event!

name: The Walls
description: A story of escape filled with nightmares, trapped within a simulation universe that is reality itself. Markus, dragged into a deep psychological pit by the pain of losing his family, finds himself confronting his nightmares in this simulation universe.

name: The VIllage of Eri
description: The Village of Eri is a rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired, platformer. You'll explore the world, fight bosses, buy gear and upgrade your character along the way. You may even choose what to keep for your next run if you can afford it.All of this in order to restore the village.

name: The Tomb of Corruption
description: Explore procedurally generated dungeons and slash hordes of monsters in THE TOMB OF CORRUPTION! - A 3D action RPG with rogue-lite elements. Fully customize your melee and ranged weapon with hundreds of upgrades, unlock skills, upgrade your armor and get ready to enter the voxel dungeon!

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Slaughter Family Execution Pack 2
description: Terrorize the Victims even more with these new, grisly executions for the Slaughter Family! This pack features one kill each for Leatherface, The Cook, The Hitchhiker, Sissy, Johnny, and Nancy. Enjoy the hunt!

name: There's Something In The Ice
description: In 2015, three scientists at the Antarctic research station "Zarya" drilled into the ice to a depth of 2 kilometers and took samples for study... It seems that what they found was not at all what they were looking for...

name: There's something wrong with...
description: Short first-person horror experience where you navigate through dark tunnels, hide from a monstrous entity, and uncover the biggest secret of your life.

name: The Rise
description: Help Sam and Elicy on their challenging journey through the abyss. An epic 2D precision platform game where exploring the unknown, overcoming obstacles, and discovering secrets are crucial to reaching the top of the abyss. Adventure awaits you!

name: The Scarlet Chaos
description: Join Detective Haerrison and his partner on a case involving a supernatural killer and a haunting entity called the Hat Man. Along the way, take on side quests and explore the semi-open world of Kelaura in this dark turn based RPG adventure.

name: The Ten Soul
description: As time passes, waves of stronger and stronger monsters will attack, with nowhere to run and the need to defend the crystals behind you, which give some ability to kill the monsters to improve your own attributes, or you can sign a contract with them to fight alongside you.

name: The State of Nowhere
description: Assigned to station 65, your role as employee 100411 will be to serve and sell products to the people, exercising the controls the state deems necessary to keep the population in line

name: TheSpoiler
description: When you come to your senses, you find yourself trapped in a nightmare. The books scattered around will guide you through your future.

name: The Singing Saw Simulator
description: Dive into the sensational world of Singing Saw Simulator - a rythm game with a twist! (Or should that be a bend?) Unleash your inner virtuoso as you soar, swoop, sing, and shred your way to your next musical masterpiece in this pulsing, two-tone, musical performance of a lifetime.

name: The Silent Forests
description: Embark on a captivating journey through the Silent Forests, treacherous sewers, and a mysterious house. Solve puzzles, face monsters, and unravel hidden truths in this adrenaline-packed adventure with a wacky narrator! 🚪✨

name: The Shadow Cat
description: Transform into a mysterious black cat, navigate through various traps in the shadows, and find the treasure in the ancient castle.

name: These Thieving Hearts
description: A wealthy benefactor. A master lockpick. A magical bodyguard. A trusted ally. A skillful rival. All of them are out to steal priceless treasures. Which one of them will steal your heart?

name: The Raptured
description: The Raptured is a TPS horror survival video game that follows Fletcher in Still Pines, overrun by apparitions that stalk the player. Find out what happened to the town, and try not to be consumed by the treacherous hordes of the apparitions.

name: The Recurrence
description: Explore an open-ended nightmare using paranormal equipment to survive an onslaught of evil spirits that await your return.

name: The Red Button
description: Resist the urge to press the button and do not uncover the secrets that may lie within its crimson facade. The choice is yours: to press or not to press.

name: There's No Dinosaurs 2
description: We are back with “There’s No Dinosaurs 2” - a relaxing hidden object point & click game in which your objective is to locate randomly placed dinosaurs amongst nine brand new cozy environments with beautifully hand-drawn graphics. Can you find all the dinosaurs?🦖

name: The Resonant
description: The Resonant is a Roguelite game w/ Magic, Dark Fantasy, FPS, Dungeon crawler, and Parkour (Wall Run/Dash) gameplay. Unlock over 100+ spells from 10 different elements to create your own custom magic spell slinging mage known as a Reaper. Play as single player or 2-6 player Co-op.

name: The Ord Accord
description: Plunge into a puzzling exploration of an unfortunate and tragic situation. Dodge vicious chickens and tough bosses, and suffer a cornucopia of painful losses, as you venture deep inside in a castle where the mad reside.

name: The One
description: The One is a game in which your goal will be alone or in a group of up to four players to explore the world three years after the zombie apocalypse. However, it's not only zombies that will prove to be a problem, but also others who have managed to survive this time behind the gates of the bunkers.

name: The Mystery of Blackthorn Castle 2
description: Travel back in time to Blackthorn Castle in this much larger game sequel. Break the dark wizard's spells and make deals with a bridge troll!

name: The Night Jackals Vol. 1
description: "The Night Jackal" is a captivating game where you experience tension as you discover someone breaking into your phone through your security camera. In this game, you'll confront your fears with contemporary technology invading privacy.

name: The Nightmare Accord
description: A single player or coop game experience that pits players in the world of nightmares as a customizable child conquering their fears!

name: The Nightwatch
description: Fight your way through hordes of monsters in this highly customisable 2D survival roguelite. Explore, unearth and make the most out of the upgrades, talent trees and items available to push through the attack. What will you find in the dark floors of the wizard tower, and will you save the night ?

name: The Multiverse Trilogy
description: Introducing The Multiverse Trilogy. The prequel to Alternate Universe

name: The Mosquito Gang
description: Do you want to drink blood and buzz forever? Or to swat an annoying insect with one left hand? Dive into the eternal confrontation between human and mosquito in The Mosquito Gang!

name: The Monster War
description: Embark on an epic journey as a knight in a fantasy war. Experience Tower Defense, Side Scroller and Casual Puzzle modes all in one thrilling adventure. Defend the kingdom from the monster invasion, push back the threat, and conquer their bases of operations to emerge victorious from the war!

name: The Monarch: First Light
description: Will you be the savior to purify this land? The Monarch is a lane-defense game where you control a monarch, expand your kingdom, and defend against evil by strategically managing gold resources, recruiting diverse units, and exploring a world filled with mythical threats.

name: The Mines of White Label
description: If you want a good outcome, you need a good income. One of the largest companies in the kingdom has fallen into liquidation. Use your trusty hammer and the gap in the market to fight your way to the top.

name: The Midnight Walkers
description: Midnight Walkers is a horror PVPVE FPS game set in an intense indoor environment in an isolated building. Instead of limiting the battlefield horizontally, experience the unique suspense and fun that sets you apart from other games of the same genre by limiting the level of the building.

name: The Meridian Gate
description: Use advanced sword fighting mechanics to break the posture of your enemies, unlock hidden techniques and acquire powers from a mysterious entity to help uncover the secrets of the eternal lighthouse.

name: The Magic World 2: Curse of the Ancients
description: Party role-playing game. You control a squad of characters moving through an open game world. Collect items, complete quests, communicate with NPCs, try to survive, destroy enemies with various magic and weapons.

name: The Magician Of Justice
description: A personally created numerical RPG mini game，The game is full of exploration and randomness, collecting various abilities such as spirit stones, scrolls, weapons, etc. by finding treasure chests or eliminating monsters, and each battle has a different experience

name: The Lost Village: Fantasy
description: The sky shattered, and a group of folks who called themselves adventurers fell into this world. Their personalities are quirky yet passionately fiery, seemingly always filled with curiosity and hope. Currently, these folks are exploring the entirety of the cultivation world.

name: The Liminal Space
description: "The Liminal Space" is a thrilling horror adventure game. Explore surreal landscapes, solve puzzles, and escape from terrifying monsters. Are you ready to face the challenges? Enter "The Liminal Space" now!

name: The Lightless World
description: The Lightless World is a PC reverse horror action RPG co-op game set in a cosmic horror universe where players control demonic god protagonists.

name: The Legends of Maui
description: Defy gods and trick great spirits as you travel Aotearoa as the trickster Maui, in a time of magic. Based on the legends of Maui as well as several other myths and folklore from New Zealand.

name: The Implant
description: This is my first relatively big game. You are the brain of a huge narketing company that helps their clients to achieve their sales goals. And you do it in a creative way creating newsbreaks, opinion leaders and shows. Simulating life as you see it should be. And it works because of the implant plan

name: The Island: Escape Room
description: You wake up on an unknown island, alone and without help. Will you be able to solve the mysteries it contains? Will you find out how you got there? Could you escape from The Island?

name: The Jester's Revenge
description: Discover a humorous, supernatural adventure with a jester's ghost seeking revenge on the king. Use spectral powers to haunt and vex in a kingdom blending comedy with gothic horror. Become the master of spectral pranks in this unique, ghostly rebellion.

name: The Jusou 3
description: Why was that cursed nest born... A story tracing back even further, 25 years to its very origins. Exploration inside the school is done using a 3D map! Brace yourself and advance through the corridors swirling with terror!

name: The Krampus
description: A realistic third-person horror set in the 1800s. Play as brave children escaping Krampus. Navigate diverse levels, including Krampus' workshop and a haunting Victorian home. Choose to brave the nightmare solo or team up with a friend in online co-op. Run, hide, and find your way to survival

name: The Lands of Hyberian
description: Welcome to The Lands of Hyberian. The kingdom of Tydrall is ruled by the king and queen who have claimed all The Lands of Hyberian. It is up to the brave knights of Tydrall to answer the kings summon! Prepare your training and bring your wisdom as the king seeks an audience with you.

name: The Last Camp 1990
description: The Last Camp 1990 is a horror game about a group of friends who go camping in the middle of woods.

name: The Last Child
description: Discover the stunning world of The Last Child. In it you will enjoy the beauty of the world, its deepest darkness and its brightest light. A side view will allow you to concentrate on the world and its characters. Your adventure, your decision can change it.

name: The Last Days of Friendship Valley
description: A deckbuilding narrative RPG about conflict negotiation, goats, and impending doom. Make your own goat character, navigate arguments with cards, uncover an ancient mystery, and try to save the world.

name: The Last Safe Place
description: 1853; Mysterious Civilization Unearthed under Ember Mountain! Anthracite coal miners tell of vast treasures exhumed from a forgotten city, full of mysterious ruins and otherworldly beauty. Join the exhibition as you descend through uncharted caverns to find The Last Safe Place.

name: The Last Stop
description: You're caught in a cycle of light and darkness in a subway car. This eerie dynamic demands memory, strategy, and swift decisions to traverse the unknown. Each moment of visibility is crucial to reach your goal: "The Last Stop".

name: The Legend of Elrian
description: The Legend of Elrian is an adventure with retro GameBoy inspired visuals. You incarnate Elrian, an Elf who has to leave his village to rescue his missing brother.

name: The Legend Of Perchta
description: The Legend of Perchta is a fast FPS with roguelite elements in a fantasy world. Find and defeat the Devil himself with God-given magic powers. Unlock new heroes, collect spells, upgrade magic wands and craft powerful magic runes to fight your way through waves of monsters.

name: The Goose Tale
description: You are a simple and vulnerable goose with a mortal mission, steal and escape from the bigest organization on the planet. The Goose Tale is a 3D platform game, where you will use skills and make easier your escape from the organization.

name: The Immemorial Order
description: After living in your new house for a few months, you discover the previous owners have left behind some items that were never meant to be found.

name: The Idle
description: The ultimate idle clicker game with endless possibilities and infinite fun. Passive and active income, seven currencies, interest, bets, prestige, perks and many more features are available!

name: The Hunt for the Lost Treasure 2
description: Fulfill your treasure hunt craving in this mind-teasing puzzle adventure on a newly discovered archipelago of islands in the Pacific Ocean not far from the Galápagos Islands.

name: The Haunting of Joni Evers
description: The Haunting of Joni Evers is a psychologically thrilling first-person strollplayer set in the small town of Harvest, Oklahoma. Confront, examine, and reexamine Joni’s memories in this emotional story of estranged family underscored by a malevolent, interdimensional haunting.

name: The hardest game in the universe 2: New DLC
description: 3 new stages in the new DLC of the most impossible game in the universe

name: The hardest game in the universe 2: Final DLC
description: Prepare for the ultimate test of skill and determination with the "Ultimate Challenge" DLC for "The Hardest Game in the Universe 2"! This expansion takes the difficulty to unprecedented heights, introducing over 20 new levels designed to push even the most seasoned players to their limits.

name: The Green Room Experiment: Episode 3
description: You're locked in a dream and you need to wake up. Unravel the mysteries of this surreal exploration series and immerse yourself in a dreamlike, strange and solitary universe.

name: The Great Rebellion
description: The Great Rebellion is a cyberpunk 2D sidescrolling run'n'gun roguelite using mouse/twinstick-shooter controls. It features randomly generated levels, multiple difficulty modes (including optional permadeath), a dynamic soundtrack and an upgradeable player character.

name: The Great Couturier
description: Create, evolve, and compete with other players in this fashion-focused game. Can you rise from a novice to become The Great Couturier?

name: Fortnite: Chill Vibez Pack
description:
Two things that Reverie lives for: good vibez and sweet dreamz. Vibe out with the Chill Vibez Pack. Includes an Outfit with LEGO Style, Back Bling, Pickaxe, Wrap and 600 V-Bucks.

V-Bucks included with this purchase can't be transferred to or used on Nintendo Switch.

name: O Vagabundo
description: O Vagabundo is a short adventure game that tells the story of a boy who wakes up in his house and his mother isn't home. Not knowing what happened or how long he slept, he goes out to look for food until several things start to happen.

name: Prometheus Unbound
description: Prometheus Unbound is a 2D stealth platformer with graceful speed and machine-precision movement. Play as the monstrous machine-made-mortal,Anala. Use her unassuming human form to maneuver through a neo-gothic sprawl and transform into a volatile, electric form to hunt enemies.

name: The Enchanted Worlds
description: Three enchanted books transport you to the worlds written on their pages. In this latest adventure with Uncle Henry, he has had a secret kept for many years that he now wishes to share with you.

name: The Emperor
description: "The Emperor" is a simulation game for dynasty cultivation. In the game, as the master of the divine realm, you can work hard to conquer the world, expand your territory, and govern the world. You can also cultivate education and benefit the people. Come and establish your kingdom's hegemony.

name: The Eerie Surroundings
description: Observe your surrounding and be confident there is or is not a anomaly to progress.

name: The Dungeon: Dungeon Awaits
description: Dungeon-Dungeon is a turn-based, loot-heavy fantasy roguelike dungeon crawler. Each step forward is a dance to avoid checkmate. Every monster and weapon has a unique shape, similar to a chess piece. Make the right moves, create a unique build, and conquer the Dungeon-Dungeon!

name: The Drylands
description: Create the perfect team and car to traverse through The Drylands fighting for loot and discovering traces of a lost civilization, while an ancient growing power further shapes the world in its image.

name: The Elliot Brown Case
description: A new kind of detective game where you uncover cases entirely represented with cards. Interrogate any character about ANY other card. Dissect the events that lead to Eliott Brown's demise... Then write your own thrilling investigation stories and share them to fellow detectives around the world.

name: The Farmer & the Chicken
description: Unleash the chicken's power and escape in this arcade adventure to avoid being caught by the farmer!

name: The Exile Princes
description: A story focused, old school, procedural RPG: raise your banner and bring your house to victory in the unique medieval fantasy setting of the Exile Realms. Start out in questing service, gain companions, followers, power and influence, and ultimately through strength or guile learn to rule the lands.

name: The End of Humanity
description: Survival and construction at the end of zombies, rebuilding homes or becoming plunderers, witnessing the extinction and struggle of human nature

name: The Final Farewell
description: The Final Farewell is a cosy narrative adventure about finding peace in death, and learning to let go. As a lost ghost, befriend wayward mortals and piece together misty memories. Lay to rest the echoes of the past and discover the truth of your own demise.

name: The Forest Ranger
description: The Forest Ranger (TFR) is a psychological horror game where you take the role of a ranger and paranormal things happen

name: The Collector
description: A third-person action-adventure game with horror elements.

name: The Chancellor's Plot
description: After receiving a letter from a wealthy and powerful benefactor, you journey into the depths of an abandoned mansion to recover a mysterious artifact. But soon you will learn the reason this place has been abandoned.

name: The Circle Tales: Elvenwoods
description: The Circle Tales: Elvenwoods is a free-to-play action-adventure game where you embark on a journey to slay a god. The very first game by Studio Castor, set in a medieval high fantasy open world.

name: The Crack
description: Crack is a text adventure game that combines a profound emotional experience with elements of mystery and puzzle-solving. In this game, players embark on a journey to revisit the past, explore themselves, and uncover hidden secrets.

name: The Cyber Masquerade
description: Degenerate loner jailbreaks a stolen android.

name: The Darkness Below
description: Embark on an epic journey into "The Darkness Below", a homage to the golden era of 90's cRPGs, with grid-based movement, turn-based combat and 2.5D perspective. Wander a vast and colorful fantasy world filled with puzzles, exotic creatures, forgotten dungeons and ancient guardians.

name: The Dark Plague: Trials Of Galwefeld
description: Survive a relentless pursuit by a terrifying entity in this top-down horror adventure. Explore a dark and atmospheric world, gather parts to craft a weapon, and face your fears in a thrilling showdown. Can you escape the fate of becoming one of them?

name: The Dark Side of Ceclon
description: Jensen, the sole survivor of the Nexentia shuttle crash on the planet CECLON. Alone, light years away from all human life! You will have to face the Nocturnes, primitive creatures in order to bring back the Veka energy, humanity's only hope.

name: The Dark Story
description: Welcome to THE DARK STORY get ready for a chilling adventure in a jungle mansion. Your task: survive, explore, and escape before the horrors within engulf you. Beware of jumpscares around every corner. Can you brave the darkness and uncover the secrets within?

name: The Dark Horde
description: The Dark Horde is an exciting roguelike deckbuilder where the cost to play cards is TIME. Play your cards to summon a horde of minions and to cast powerful sorceries! Improve your defenses, acquire rare cards, level up, unlock new upgrades and then lay waste to each human settlements!

name: The Dawn Of A Flower
description: "She became a prince to survive." Historical materials of ancient Egypt Fusion fantasy romance game "The Dawn Of A Flower"

name: The Dawning Clocks of Time: Remake
description: A story of love, war and betrayal on an intergalatic scale. A epic third person shooter with both sandbox and linear story progression. Take up arms and battle for the ages, who will decide the fate for all of humanity? Now remade in HD / 4K with cinematic presentation.

name: The Apocalypse Sacrifice
description: The Apocalypse Sacrifice is a point and click adventure game with multiple endings. You take on the role of an adventurer who has lost his memory, with the only clue being a note found in his mouth. As you recover your memories, you uncover chilling secrets hidden within the town.

name: The Bunker
description: Go throughout an abandoned bunker with your friends collecting all the notepads. Beware of the zombies that lurk within.

name: The Butler Did It
description: Battle robots, make friends, and uncover a bizarre conspiracy to avert the apocalypse in this comedy of manners and mayhem with steampunk blasters!

name: The Bright Star Of Seraph-Katis
description: The Bright Star Of Seraph-Katis is a short text adventure game. This game combines a visual novel and an "adventure mode".

name: The Black Siege
description: The Black Plague had ravaged 14th Century Europe, turning humans into carnivorous monsters that brought destruction to the continent. Your kingdom stands as the last bastion. Build your fortress, mine resources and train troops to hold out until help arrives in this builder-defense roguelike.

name: The Bibites: Digital Life
description: Explore real digital life in The Bibites! Play god as you guide your bibites on their evolutionary journey. Analyze their Neural Network brains and genetic information as they adapt to their environments. Save your favorites and test their strength in Challenge Mode!

name: The Backrooms: Descent
description: The Backrooms: Descent is a 1-4 player co-op horror experience. You are tasked with descending into the vast levels of the Backrooms which have dangerous entities while also finding evidence of previous research teams before you find your escape.

name: The Beautiful Island
description: A short visual novel about war, peace and hope. Explore a city after a devastating war. Talk to people, try to understand, try to help. The heroes of war are dead, but you can be a hero of peace!

name: The Belligerence
description: A single player game developed to differentiate itself from existing fighting games. It can be enjoyed with a feeling closest to a real fight. The right stick-based attack and walking parry system provide sensory control. There is a mode to fight cpu and belly hard is incredibly strong

name: The Berlin Apartment
description: The Berlin Apartment tells the moving stories of inhabitants of an apartment in the city of Berlin over the last 120 years in several unique, emotional episodes as a character-driven adventure game.

name: Asuka 120% LimitOver Burning Fest.
description: Asuka 120% LimitOver Burning Fest. is an "unofficial" update to the series' earlier "Limited" entry on Sega Saturn. It was originally released in 1998 as a series of patch files to be used on a legitimate copy of the game. This version of the game is stripped down purely to its "Versus" mode, and features a heavily rebalanced cast, along with a few mechanical tweaks.

name: Rosenkreuzstilette Bundle
description: This bundle contains both the series from Rosenkreuzstilette: "Rosenkreuzstilette" and "Rosenkreuzstilette Freudenstachel".

name: Ghostbusters
description: Ghostbusters is an action game that features an overhead-view and a side-view. From Ghostbusters HQ, the player must monitor a map of midtown Manhattan for "ghost alarms", as well as for casual, roaming spirits, and plot a route to the alarmed area. Once the route is plotted, the player then controls the purchased Ghostmobile as it drives through traffic. Here, the player is able to capture casual ghosts on the way if they are en route. When the haunted location is reached, the game switches to a side-view. Two of the Ghostbusters will take position, activate their proton beams, and toss a trap to the ground. The player must then use the two Ghostbusters to attempt to lead the ghost(s) over the placed trap. Once activated, the trap springs to capture any ghosts directly above it. A successful capture will earn the player money, which can then be used to purchase new Ghostbusters vehicles and new modifications for it. An unsuccessful capture will see the ghost fly away (after nastily sliming one of the Ghostbusters).

name: Hundred Fires: The rising of red star - Episode 2
description: Hundred Fires is an action, stealth and infiltration game with an exciting story and incredible cinematics. This is a one man infiltration mission, you alone cannot defeat the entire Soviet army, you must use your best skills to hide, sneak away from the enemy and go undetected.

name: Millipede
description: The NES port of Millipede, a 1982 arcade game by Atari, Inc. and the sequel to the arcade hit, Centipede. The objective of the game is to score as many points as possible by destroying all segments of the millipede as it moves toward the bottom of the screen, as well as destroying and avoiding other enemies. The game is played with a trackball and a single fire button, which can be held down for rapid-fire. The game is over when the player's last life is lost.

name: Thong Girl: The Video Game
description: The Adventures of Thong Girl combines classic 2D beat-em-up platforming with high-scoring arena action. Help our scantily clad super heroine defeat wave after wave of roid-raging bodybuilders, antipathetic teenagers, and gun-toting gangstas. Join in the fun with Thong Girl as she works her butt off to get to the bottom of the riots plaguing Music City.

name: L: A Mathemagical Adventure
description: This classic text adventure game (with graphics) was "designed to use and stimulate your mathematical imagination".

name: Nasty Zombies
description: Blast through hordes of Nasty Zombies solo or with up to 3 friends! Face dynamic map layouts, ensuring every run is unique. Unlock perks and power-ups with your hard-earned cash in this wave-based, retro-inspired shooter.

name: 112 Reddings Helikopter
description:
112 Reddings Helikopter is an action game that takes place in the cities of Amsterdam and Berlin. Completely remodeled to give the feeling of flying over the city in a helicopter. The player has a total of 20 missions to complete, these are dangerous missions with the ultimate goal to bring the person at risk to safety within a limited amount of time.

The fires, traffic accidents, chemical disasters, armed robbery, factory accidents, sudden heart attacks and rescues from tall buildings are some of the many situations that will occur.

name: 2 Games: Tomorrow Never Dies / The World Is Not Enough
description: A twin pack for PlayStation that includes James Bond 007: Tomorrow Never Dies and James Bond 007: The World Is Not Enough.

name: Moai no Su
description: Sin descripción

name: Ether
description: Ether is a puzzle game that makes use of the already implemented physics, but lets the player interact with them in a completely new way. Taking place in a world were gravity has shaped everything from animals to houses, and from weather to communication devices, the player is faced with different obstacles on her way through the game. To progress, the player has the ability to change the gravitational state of nearly every loose object in the environment using a stick. This stick can turn objects weightless, freeze them mid-air or have them fall back on the ground. Hoping to bring a brand new experience with the game play we have no intentions of leaving the visuals unaltered. The Source Engine is deeply modified to provide a vision of something new, a world that feels alive and different from what you have seen before.

name: James Bond 007: Nightfire
description: The PC version of James Bond 007: Nightfire was developed by Gearbox Software while Eurocom developed the home console version. It is mostly the same except for the removal of driving sections used in home console versions and some other minor modifications to the single player and multiplayer modes.

name: Solar Raiders
description: Suit up, grab your guns, and embark on a cosmic heist in this fast-paced bullet-hell roguelite. Solo or with friends, your goal is to overcome enemy packed dungeons and steal the Solar Core. Raid, loot, unlock powerful skills, create unstoppable builds and prepare to die.

name: 1-Bit Explorer
description:
1-Bit Explorer is an adventure game focused on exploration where you do NOT save the world and the world does NOT need saving.

The point is to explore to your heart's content and uncover mysteries and secrets (or don't, it's up to you, really).

name: 1-Bit Halloween
description: 1-Bit Halloween focuses on a home visit that a priest makes to a family. The game is on a single map with all the rooms of the house being visible to the player (like Dogville movie, in which you could see everything that happened in different places at once).

name: 2-Bit Explorer
description: 2-Bit Explorer is a game where exploration is king. A Lovecraftian Zelda-like. Explore the labyrinth that apparently has 1 more bit than you do and find you way out of the strange reality you find yourself in. Find the one you seek...

name: Papa's Paleteria To Go!
description: After winning a priceless pendant at the grand opening of Papa's Paleteria, excitement turns to chaos when Toby the Sea Lion dashes off with your cherished prize! Papa Louie sets off in pursuit, and leaves you to run the new shop instead! Now it's up to you to helm the operation, crafting delectable paletas and ice pops for everyone visiting the seaside town of San Fresco.
